attributes.action: The government should keep its promise and make sure that every child can go to primary school wherever they live in the world.
attributes.additional_details:
The UK government, along with other governments, agreed that by 2015, all children in the world should be in primary education.  There are still 67 million children, mostly girls, who do not go to school.  We have three years left to reach out goal!

More info at http://www.sendmyfriend.org/about-us
